title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, November 14, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the painter Claude Monet (1840-1926), whose color palette shifted into muddy reds and yellows as he gradually lost his vision.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the painter Claude Monet (1840-1926), whose color palette shifted into muddy reds and yellows as he gradually lost his vision.
